About

I am a full-stack developer and a Full time student that just completed my GCSE's. I am currently focused on improving myself by constantly learning and applying new knowledge and obtaining a wide variety of experiences. My coding journey began in 2020 and since then I've picked it up as a hobby playing around with multiple programming languages such as HTML,CSS,Javascript,PHP,kotlin,python and hope to pursue Web development as a career.

👷🏾‍♂️ Work History

volunteering

  • Currently volunteering to maintain a website for a religious organisation called MFB:

    The Muslim Forum of Britain (MFB) is an organisation that draws its membership from Nigerian Muslims resident in the UK who are either students or professionals, to promote collaboration and unity within the Muslim communities in the UK. MFB works with other organisations to eradicate any forms of discrimination faced by Muslims in the UK as well as finding ways to positively empower and educate the community nationwide.
